statements: SELECT * FROM satellite_tracking_data;
SELECT satellite_id, latitude, longitude FROM satellite_tracking_data WHERE altitude > 30000;
SELECT * FROM satellite_tracking_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59';
SELECT satellite_id, MAX(latitude) AS max_latitude FROM satellite_tracking_data GROUP BY satellite_id;
SELECT satellite_id, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM satellite_tracking_data GROUP BY satellite_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 10;
SELECT * FROM satellite_tracking_data WHERE satellite_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT satellite_id, latitude, longitude FROM satellite_tracking_data WHERE altitude > 10000 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT satellite_id, timestamp, altitude FROM satellite_tracking_data WHERE latitude > 30 AND longitude < -100;
SELECT * FROM satellite_tracking_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' AND altitude > 5000 ORDER BY altitude DESC, timestamp ASC;
SELECT AVG(altitude) AS average_altitude, MAX(altitude) AS max_altitude, MIN(altitude) AS min_altitude FROM satellite_tracking_data WHERE satellite_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM satellite_tracking_data WHERE satellite_id = 1;
SELECT longitude, latitude FROM satellite_tracking_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT satellite_id, timestamp, altitude FROM satellite_tracking_data WHERE longitude > 50;
SELECT satellite_id, latitude, longitude FROM satellite_tracking_data WHERE altitude < 1000;
SELECT * FROM future_satellite_positions WHERE prediction_timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY predicted_longitude ASC;
SELECT * FROM satellite_tracking_data WHERE latitude > 0 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT satellite_id, timestamp, latitude, longitude FROM satellite_tracking_data WHERE longitude < 0 AND altitude > 10000;
SELECT timestamp, predicted_latitude AS lat, predicted_longitude AS lon, predicted_altitude AS alt FROM future_satellite_positions WHERE prediction_timestamp >= NOW();
SELECT satellite_id, AVG(latitude) AS avg_lat, AVG(longitude) AS avg_lon FROM satellite_tracking_data GROUP BY satellite_id;
SELECT satellite_id, MAX(altitude) AS max_altitude, MIN(altitude) AS min_altitude FROM satellite_tracking_data GROUP BY satellite_id ORDER BY max_altitude DESC;
SELECT * FROM satellite_tracking_data;
SELECT satellite_id, latitude, longitude FROM satellite_tracking_data WHERE altitude > 1000;
SELECT satellite_id, timestamp, altitude FROM satellite_tracking_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT satellite_name, launch_date FROM satellite_meta_data WHERE operator = 'SpaceX';
SELECT * FROM satellite_positions WHERE predicted_altitude < 500;
SELECT * FROM satellite_tracking_data WHERE satellite_id = 1;
SELECT satellite_id, timestamp, latitude FROM satellite_tracking_data WHERE latitude < 0;
SELECT position_id, satellite_id, timestamp, predicted_latitude, predicted_longitude FROM satellite_positions WHERE satellite_id = 2 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT satellite_id, satellite_name, launch_date FROM satellite_meta_data WHERE operator = 'NASA';
SELECT * FROM satellite_tracking_data WHERE altitude BETWEEN 1000 AND 2000 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM satellites;
SELECT satellite_id, satellite_name, launch_date FROM satellites WHERE launch_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT satellite_name, last_tracking_date FROM satellites ORDER BY last_tracking_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM tracking_data WHERE altitude IS NOT NULL;
SELECT model_name, trained_date, accuracy FROM predictive_model WHERE accuracy > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM satellites;
SELECT satellite_id, satellite_name, launch_date FROM satellites ORDER BY launch_date DESC;
SELECT satellite_id, satellite_name FROM satellites WHERE launch_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT tracking_id, tracking_date, latitude, longitude FROM tracking_data WHERE altitude IS NOT NULL;

SELECT p.model_id, p.model_name, pp.prediction_date, pp.predicted_latitude, pp.predicted_longitude FROM predictive_model p JOIN predicted_positions pp ON p.model_id = pp.model_id WHERE p.accuracy > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM SatellitePositions;
SELECT satellite_id, latitude, longitude FROM SatellitePositions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT satellite_id, timestamp, latitude FROM SatellitePositions WHERE longitude > 0;
SELECT satellite_id, MAX(latitude) AS max_latitude, MIN(latitude) AS min_latitude FROM SatellitePositions GROUP BY satellite_id;
SELECT * FROM SatelliteNames WHERE satellite_name LIKE 'ISS%';
SELECT satellite_id, timestamp, latitude, longitude FROM SatellitePositions WHERE satellite_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM TrackingData WHERE signal_strength > 0.5 AND latency < 1.0 ORDER BY tracking_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM OrbitalParameters WHERE eccentricity < 0.1 AND inclination > 45 ORDER BY epoch DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT satellite_id, satellite_name FROM SatelliteNames WHERE LENGTH(satellite_name) > 5 ORDER BY satellite_id ASC;
SELECT prediction_id, satellite_id, predicted_timestamp, predicted_latitude, predicted_longitude FROM PredictedPositions ORDER BY predicted_timestamp ASC LIMIT 20;
